item.title: Greece: America’s Future
item.description: As I waited to appear on Larry Kudlow’s show last Friday, I heard Larry announce over and over again that he’s sick of hearing about Greece’s problems. Greece isn’t America. The U.S. economy is booming, and Greece can’t hurt it. I didn’t tell Larry, but I think he was wrong. Greece’s problems will hurt the American economy because Greece’s problems foreshadow a far more dangerous crash headed to America. Markets are people.
